Class NamePrinter

java.lang.Object
  NamePrinter

public class NamePrinter
extends java.lang.Object

A very simple program that prints out a name in two different ways

Constructor Summary
NamePrinter()
           
 
Method Summary
 void drawNameTag()
          Draw a nametag on the graphics pane The rectangular nametag is 300 units wide and 150 units high and the left edge is 100 units over and the top is 70 units down
 void printNameTag()
          Print a nametag with a name inside a box made of asterisks
